item.title: Trump suggests U.S. military will hit cartels on ‘land’ in Mexico
item.description: President Donald Trump's comments on Fox News come less than a week after land strikes in Venezuela and the capture of its leader Nicolas Maduro.

item.title: Supreme Court tariff decision: U.S. Customs has new deadline for companies seeking refunds
item.description: The window for U.S. importers to file for electronic refunds if the Supreme Court rules Trump's IEEPA tariffs are illegal is approaching.

item.title: Houses passes ACA subsidies; fate of bill murky in Senate
item.description: A bipartisan Senate working group is negotiating a separate deal to address the expiration of ACA tax credits.

item.title: Iran's leader accuses protesters of acting for Trump
item.description: Iran's supreme leader accused protesters of acting on behalf of U.S. President Donald Trump by destroying public properties in their own country.

item.title: Trump is desperate to take Greenland. Can NATO defend itself — and is it willing to?
item.description: Trump’s ambition for Greenland raises questions about what happens when two NATO members come to blows.
